price: 41. Мре alobaki: Bomata okati na yango na nkombo ya Allah oyo afandisi yango likolo ya etamboli na yango. Ya soló, Nkolo na ngai azali penza molimbisi atonda ngolu.
arabic: ۞ وَقَالَ ٱرۡكَبُواْ فِيهَا بِسۡمِ ٱللَّهِ مَجۡر۪ىٰهَا وَمُرۡسَىٰهَآۚ إِنَّ رَبِّي لَغَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٞ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: waqāla ir'kabū fīhā bis'mi al-lahi majrahā wamur'sāhā inna rabbī laghafūrun raḥīmun
